definitions.definition: a style that is popular at a particular time, especially in clothes, hair, make-up, etc.:
examples: Long hair is back in fashion for men.

definitions.definition: to do what is popular at the time
If you use something like it's going out of fashion, you use large amounts of it very quickly:
examples: Emma spends money like it's going out of fashion.

definitions.definition: to make something using your hands:
examples: He fashioned a hat for himself from/out of newspaper.
